resources.string: Hello! Think of an animal and I\'ll try and guess it; press OK when you\'re ready!
Thank you! I\'ll remember that for next time.
Are you ready to play another round?
I give up! What animal are you thinking of?
Oh, I\'ve never heard of %1$s before. What question can I ask to distinguish %2$s from %1$s?
e.g. Does it have a curly tail?
I see! So, for %s, would the answer be yes or no?
You didn\'t give your animal a name!
